about_the_game:
As you know, Chess is created from real war scenes. Kings played this game to improve their strategy skills.

But... Is it possible to play chess while enjoying real war scenes or is it possible to combine chess with war visionary of any of middle age kings?

This is no longer a dream!

Chessium offers 3D Chess experience where people can play chess and feel themselves in the middle of war!

We did not forget traditional Chess players who may not be willing to play 3D animated chess.

Because of that the game contains 2D and 3D modes.

While your opponent play with 3D animations, you can enjoy chess in traditional way.

Join our community and support us in this journey!
